original_text:
Age of the Gods God of Storms
Visto l’enorme successo che ha ottenuto la saga di Age of the Gods non poteva di certo fermarsi la sua fortunata era: proprio per questo parleremo di Age of the Gods: God of Storms, titolo che è stato sviluppato da un colosso come Playtech. In questo caso si viene proiettati in un vero e proprio scontro tra titani, dove la figura centrale è legata al mito del Dio dei venti Eolo. E’ lui infatti che può regalare altissime vittorie con il suo soffio potente sui rulli, utile per incrementare le possibilità di combinazioni. Il tutto avviene su una griglia di 5 rulli con 25 linee di pagamento realizzata con una buona resa grafica sia per desktop che per dispositivi mobile. Non manca poi la chance di vincere un jackpot assegnato in modo casuale per un massimo di 4 montepremi di gioco. Vediamo da vicino quali sono le parti più interessanti di questa slot e le sue funzionalità speciali partendo da un RTP interessante fissato al 96.14%.
Grafica e simboli di gioco
La prima cosa che si nota quando viene avviato il gioco è lo sfondo, che ci porta a notare un meraviglioso paesaggio marino. Sei pronto a combattere? Lo scopo del gamer è quello di lanciarsi in questa tempesta e riuscire a superarla per vincere enormi ricompense. I simboli scelti per sostenere il tema a livello grafico sono gli Arcieri, gli Uomini armati, le Donne con spade, un Mostro marino e le immancabili carte da gioco classiche che vanno da 10, J, Q, K, A. Ciò che ci ha maggiormente sorpreso è indubbiamente la ‘tempesta’ che viene scatenata dal soffio di Eolo. Si attiva nel momento in cui il simbolo della Nave va a coprire interamente un rullo: con il soffio la nave viene spostata e parte la funzione re-spin. Ogni volta che la nave si muove il moltiplicatore aumenta a un massimo di 5x ed Eolo continuerà a soffiare fino a quando non sarà scomparsa la nave. Oltre al simbolo Wild della nave abbiamo anche il simbolo Wild in marmo che aiuta a offrirti ricche vincite.
Ovviamente per avere maggiori chance di vincita e di conquista dei montepremi è importante riuscire a giocare abilmente con il valore della scommessa. Nel momento in cui riuscirai a entrare ufficialmente in corsa per i jackpot, quasi sicuramente riuscirai ad aggiudicartene almeno uno. Resta solo da capire quale valore avrà tra il Power, Extra Power, Super Power e Ultimate Power.
Considerazioni finali sulla slot Age of the Gods: God of Storms
E’ certo che per vincere di più bisogna sperare di attivare la funzione dei Venti, che possono far sommare i diversi valori attribuiti ai simboli, andando poi a moltiplicarli in base agli spostamenti che hai a tua disposizione. Tieni sempre d’occhio la nave e sfrutta la sua presenza per sfidare i venti impetuosi generati da Eolo.
Possiamo quindi dire che Age of the Gods: God of Storms è un ottimo capitolo per la saga in questione, in particolare per grafica e gameplay. Vale indubbiamente la pena provarlo sia da principiante che da giocatore high roller.

raw_translation.response:
Age of the Gods God of Storms

Given the huge success of the Age of the Gods saga, it was only natural that its lucky streak would continue with Age of the Gods: God of Storms, a title developed by the colossal Playtech. In this case, players are thrown into a true titan clash, with the central figure being linked to the myth of the Wind God Aeolus. It is he who can offer hugely rewarding wins with his powerful breath over the reels, useful in increasing the chances of combinations. The whole game takes place on a grid of 5 reels with 25 paylines, with good graphics for both desktop and mobile devices. There is also the chance to win a jackpot awarded randomly for a maximum of 4 game jackpots. Let's take a closer look at the most interesting parts of this slot and its special features, starting with an interesting RTP of 96.14%.

Graphics and game symbols

The first thing that stands out when the game is launched is the background, which shows a wonderful seascape. Are you ready to fight? The gamer's goal is to dive into this storm and overcome it to win huge rewards. The symbols chosen to support the theme graphically are the Archers, Armed Men, Women with Swords, a Sea Monster, and the classic playing cards ranging from 10, J, Q, K, A. What surprised us the most was undoubtedly the 'storm' that is unleashed by Aeolus' breath. It is triggered when the Ship symbol covers an entire reel: with the breath, the ship is moved and the re-spin function starts. Each time the ship moves, the multiplier increases to a maximum of 5x and Aeolus continues to blow until the ship disappears. In addition to the Ship Wild symbol, we also have the marble Wild symbol that helps to offer rich wins.

Of course, to have a better chance of winning and conquering jackpots, it is important to play skillfully with the value of the bet. When you officially enter the race for the jackpots, you will almost certainly be able to win at least one. It remains only to understand what value it will have between Power, Extra Power, Super Power and Ultimate Power.

Final thoughts on the slot Age of the Gods: God of Storms

It is certain that to win more, you must hope to activate the Wind function, which can add up the different values assigned to the symbols, and then multiply them based on the movements you have at your disposal. Always keep an eye on the ship and use its presence to challenge the impetuous winds generated by Aeolus.

We can therefore say that Age of the Gods: God of Storms is an excellent chapter for the saga in question, particularly for its graphics and gameplay. It is definitely worth trying for both beginners and high rollers.

Review: Age of the Gods God of Storms

After the incredible success of the Age of the Gods saga, it was clear that its fortunate era would not come to an end. In this case, you are thrown into a real battle between titans, where the central figure is linked to the myth of the God of wind, Aeolus. He is the one who can offer huge wins with his powerful breath on the reels, useful for increasing your chances of combinations. All this happens on a 5-reel grid with 25 paylines, with good graphics both for desktop and mobile devices. There is also a chance to win a randomly awarded jackpot, up to 4 game jackpots. Let's take a closer look at the most interesting parts of this slot and its special features, starting with an interesting RTP set at 96.14%.

Graphics and game symbols
The first thing you notice when the game is started is the background, which makes us notice a beautiful sea landscape. Are you ready to fight? The gamer's goal is to launch himself into this storm and manage to overcome it to win huge rewards. The symbols chosen to support the theme at a graphic level are Archers, Armed Men, Women with swords, a Sea Monster, and the inevitable classic playing cards ranging from 10, J, Q, K, A. What surprised us most is undoubtedly the 'storm' that is unleashed by Aeolus' breath. It is activated when the Ship symbol completely covers a reel: with the breath, the ship is moved and the re-spin feature starts. Every time the ship moves, the multiplier increases up to a maximum of 5x and Aeolus continues to blow until the ship disappears. In addition to the ship Wild symbol, we also have the marble Wild symbol that helps to offer rich wins.

Obviously, to have a greater chance of winning and winning the jackpots, it is important to play skillfully with the value of bets. When you manage to officially enter the race for the jackpots, you will almost certainly win at least one. It remains only to understand what value it will have among Power, Extra Power, Super Power, and Ultimate Power.

Final thoughts on the slot Age of the Gods: God of Storms
It is certain that to win more, you must hope to activate the Winds feature, which can add up the different values ​​attributed to the symbols, and then go on to multiply them based on the movements you have available. Always keep an eye on the ship and use its presence to challenge the impetuous winds generated by Aeolus.

Therefore, we can say that Age of the Gods: God of Storms is an excellent chapter for the saga in question, especially for graphics and gameplay. Definitely worth trying out both for beginners and high rollers.

Review: Age of the Gods God of Storms

After the incredible success of the Age of the Gods saga, it was clear that its fortunate era would not come to an end. That's why we're talking about Age of the Gods: God of Storms, a title developed by a giant like Playtech. In this case, you are thrown into a real battle between titans, where the central figure is linked to the myth of the God of wind, Aeolus. He is the one who can offer huge wins with his powerful breath on the reels, useful for increasing your chances of combinations. All this happens on a 5-reel grid with 25 paylines, with good graphics both for desktop and mobile devices. There is also a chance to win a randomly awarded jackpot, up to 4 game jackpots. Let's take a closer look at the most interesting parts of this slot and its special features, starting with an interesting RTP set at 96.14%.

Graphics and game symbols
The first thing you notice when the game is started is the background, which makes us notice a beautiful sea landscape. Are you ready to fight? The gamer's goal is to launch himself into this storm and manage to overcome it to win huge rewards. The symbols chosen to support the theme at a graphic level are Archers, Armed Men, Women with swords, a Sea Monster, and the inevitable classic playing cards ranging from 10, J, Q, K, A. What surprised us most is undoubtedly the 'storm' that is unleashed by Aeolus' breath. It is activated when the Ship symbol completely covers a reel: with the breath, the ship is moved and the re-spin feature starts. Every time the ship moves, the multiplier increases up to a maximum of 5x and Aeolus continues to blow until the ship disappears. In addition to the ship Wild symbol, we also have the marble Wild symbol that helps to offer rich wins.

Obviously, to have a greater chance of winning and winning the jackpots, it is important to play skillfully with the value of bets. When you manage to officially enter the race for the jackpots, you will almost certainly win at least one. It remains only to understand what value it will have among Power, Extra Power, Super Power, and Ultimate Power.

Final thoughts on the slot Age of the Gods: God of Storms
It is certain that to win more, you must hope to activate the Winds feature, which can add up the different values ​​attributed to the symbols, and then go on to multiply them based on the movements you have available. Always keep an eye on the ship and use its presence to challenge the impetuous winds generated by Aeolus.

Therefore, we can say that Age of the Gods: God of Storms is an excellent chapter for the saga in question, especially for graphics and gameplay. Definitely worth trying out both for beginners and high rollers.
